named-query.name: getMakeByYear
named-query.query: select m from Make m where :year between m.yearStart and m.yearEnd

named-query.name: getValuesByType
named-query.query: select e from Enum e where e.enumType= :type

named-query.name: getFeatureGrpByName
named-query.query: select fg from FeatureGroup fg where fg.name = :name

named-query.name: getCatByName
named-query.query: select cat from Category cat where cat.name = :name
